text:
Never been satisfied with the apps in this space...

So we are reimagining how you split expenses with your...

friends..
roommates..
family..

anyone...

Excited to build this with my partners in crime @userisjoshua @SanxRoz

@_buildspace @_nightsweekends @FarzaTV https://t.co/FtJfTU9W1f
